function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Simulation software may not accurately reflect real-world situations","Impact":"Inaccurate simulations may lead to incorrect risk assessments and ineffective mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Validation of simulation data using real-world observations and empirical data","Technologies":"Real-time monitoring systems, IoT sensors, video analytics","People":"Building designers, risk analysts, emergency responders","Owner":"Building designers, simulation software developers"},{"Description":"Identification problem in people flow modeling","Impact":"Inaccurate parameter identification may lead to incorrect occupancy estimations","Mitigation":"Use of multiple data sources for parameter identification, calibration of models using empirical data","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, machine learning algorithms","People":"Building designers, risk analysts","Owner":"Building designers, researchers"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in the state and measurement models","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling may lead to incorrect estimation of people flow and occupancy","Mitigation":"Use of Kalman filter for real-time estimation, validation of model predictions with empirical data","Technologies":"Kalman filter, real-time monitoring systems, IoT sensors","People":"Building designers, risk analysts, emergency responders","Owner":"Building designers, researchers"}]}
